name: MyHero
0:
”Alexa, open My Hero”
”Tell me a story about Henry”
”Henry is the hero!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my hero
des: Make your child the hero of their own story! You tell the skill your child's name, their friends name and what their favourite toy is and Alexa will read them a story where they are the hero, working with their sidekick friend to rescue their favourite toy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
